{"step_by_step_thinking": "The World Health Organization (WHO) classifies hearing loss in adults as follows: mild hearing loss as 26-40 dB, moderate hearing loss as 41-60 dB, severe hearing loss as 61-80 dB, and profound hearing loss as greater than 81 dB. Therefore, the value to classify as profound hearing loss according to the WHO is greater than 81 dB.", "answer_choice": "B"}
